column3: What to Plant (at least 2 per category)
Shipments where total_fob ≠ quantity × unit_price. Unit prices way outside the normal range for that product. A buyer consistently getting prices below range (suspicious discounting).
HS code that doesn't match the product category (e.g., textile product with electronics HS code). Drawback claimed on a rejected shipment. Shipment to a restricted country for that product.

Transit days way outside normal range for that route. Freight cost 3-4x higher than route average. Illogical port pairing (e.g., Bangalore ICD loading for a Sri Lanka shipment when Chennai is closer).
A usually punctual buyer suddenly taking 3x longer to pay. Payment marked received but days_to_payment is null or 0. Overdue payment beyond terms + 30 days buffer.
A buyer whose orders suddenly spike 5-10x their average. A month with abnormally high/low shipments to one country.
Insurance calculated as 2% of FOB instead of ~0.2% (10x error). CIF incoterm but freight_cost is 0. Container type too small for the shipment weight (based on quantity × weight_per_unit).
